check.name: ResourceTypePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Type concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceType is present."
if(ResourceType is not None and len(str(ResourceType)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceType concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: ResourceType
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/metadataScope/MD_MetadataScope/resourceScope/MD_ScopeCode) or (/metadata/simpleDc/type) or (/*/type) or (/*/hierarchyLevel/MD_ScopeCode) or (/metadata/distinfo/resdesc) or (/eml/*/physical/dataFormat) or (/resource/resourceType/@resourceTypeGeneral) or (/metadata/distinfo/resdesc) or (/metadata/distinfo/resdesc)

dialect.name: ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2

def call(): global output global status

status = "FAILURE" output = "OnlineResource concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: OnlineResource
selector.xpath: (//CI_Citation/onlineResource/CI_OnlineResource) or (//CI_Citation/citedResponsibleParty/CI_ResponsibleParty/contactInfo/CI_Contact/onlineResource/CI_OnlineResource) or (/OnlineResources/OnlineResource/URL) or (/DIF/Data_Set_Citation/Online_Resource) or (/DIF/Reference/Online_Resource) or (/metadata/distinfo/stdorder/digform/onlinopt/networka) or (/eml/*/physical/distribution/online) or (/metadata/distinfo/stdorder/digform/digtopt/onlinopt/computer) or (/metadata/distinfo/stdorder/digform/onlinopt/networka)

selector.name: ContributorName
selector.xpath: (/MD_Metadata/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/citedResponsibleParty/CI_Responsibility[not(normalize-space\(role/CI_RoleCode)[.='author' or .='principalInvestigator' or .='originator'])]//*[contains(name(),'Name')]//*) or (/metadata/simpleDc/contributor) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/citedResponsibleParty/CI_ResponsibleParty[not(normalize-space\(role/CI_RoleCode[.='author' or .='principalInvestigator' or .='originator']))]//*[contains(name(),'Name')]//*) or (/*/identificationInfo/*/citation/CI_Citation/citedResponsibleParty/CI_ResponsibleParty[normalize-space\(role/CI_RoleCode)='contributor']//*[contains(name(),'Name')]//*) or (/metadata/idinfo/citation/citeinfo/origin) or (/metadata/idinfo/datacred) or (/metadata/metainfo/metc/cntinfo) or (/eml/*/associatedParty) or (/resource/contributors/contributor/contributorName) or (/metadata/idinfo/datacred)
